movieList.name: 3 Idiots
movieList.description: In college, Farhan and Raju form a great bond with Rancho due to his refreshing outlook. Years later, a bet gives them a chance to look for their long-lost friend whose existence seems rather elusive.

movieList.name: DDLJ
movieList.description: Raj and Simran meet during a trip across Europe and the two fall in love. However, when Raj learns that Simran is already promised to another, he follows her to India to win her and her father over.

movieList.name: KKKG
movieList.description: The adopted but much loved elder son of a rich couple is banished by his father when he chooses to wed a middle-class woman. Their younger son sets out to find him, hoping to reunite his family.

movieList.name: Dangal
movieList.description: Mahavir Singh Phogat, a former wrestler, decides to fulfil his dream of winning a gold medal for his country by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite the existing social stigmas.

movieList.name: PK
movieList.description: An innocent alien lands on Earth but loses his communication device. He meets Jaggu, a heartbroken reporter, and tries to find his device. With time, he raises many thought-provoking questions.

movieList.name: Sholay
movieList.description: A retired police officer hires two outlaws to capture a ruthless bandit terrorizing his village.

movieList.name: Chennai Express
movieList.description: Rahul, on his way to immerse his grandfather's ashes, boards the wrong train and meets Meena, changing the course of his life.

movieList.name: Baahubali
movieList.description: A young man learns about his royal heritage and battles an oppressive king to reclaim his kingdom.

movieList.name: RRR
movieList.description: Set in the pre-independence era, this epic action drama tells the story of two revolutionaries fighting against British colonial rule.

movieList.name: Sooryavanshi
movieList.description: A cop with a mission to eliminate terrorism in India works alongside other officers to stop a dangerous plot.

movieList.name: Chhapaak

movieList.name: Ludo
movieList.description: A series of interconnected stories where four characters face challenges and life's twists, with their destinies intertwined like a game of Ludo.

movieList.description: The life journey of Bharat, from his childhood to the age of 70, and how he becomes a hero for his country.
